title: The Correct Condition?
question_text: To go forward and do a chi-square test for homogeneity, certain conditions must be met. Of the following $5$ conditions, $4$ are incorrect. Which of the following is a correct condition for doing a chi-square test for homogeneity?

choices.text:
All cell counts should be at least
10
.
Data should be collected using a stratified random sample.

Check that the sample size is at least as big as
10
%
of the population.

The sample size should be greater than
30
.
Data should be collected using a simple random sample.
